lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said a resurgence of demand from the Middle East following the recent recovery in oil prices coupled with persistent demand for power plants in developing countries will help MHI restore its exports-to-sales ratio to the past decade's average of 30 pct.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In shipping, MHI is fighting back against low-priced South Korean competition by building more technologically advanced carriers to carry liquefied natural gas and other products difficult to transport.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Securities analysts at major securities houses agreed that MHI has pared costs more quickly than its competitors.
